caption.p: The life cycle of SARS-CoV-2. ACE-2: Angiotensin converting enzyme-2, TMPRSS2: Transmembrane protease serine 2, PLpro: Papain-like protease, 3-CLpro: 3-Chymotrypsin-like protease, ORF1ab: Open reading frame 1ab, PP1ab: Polyprotein 1ab, nsp: non-structural protein, S: spike protein, E: Envelope protein, N: Nucleocapsid protein, M: Membrane protein, ERGIC: Endoplasmic reticulum-Golgi intermediate compartment.
